about_the_game:
PRESENTATION


This is a classic old-school 2D fantasy RPG.

In a place far away, Anya lives with her father Caledon. They are both alone and isolated in a small island to the south of the continent. After the catastrophe that almost decimated humanity, they can only rely on each other to survive.

Caledon's role is to prepare Anya to fend for herself in a world that is very far from hospitable. Their relative peace is altered the day a Druid comes to visit them... Everything Anya once believed will be shattered, and ready or not, she will have to take on the world outside of her island.

Embark on a journey of self-discovery, love, friendship and purpose in A Place Far Away.

FEATURES


  • A compelling storyline designed to keep one engaged from start to finish
  • Cinematic cutscenes that elevates the game's storytelling to higher levels of immersion
  • Many locations to explore, from snowy islands, to desertic mountains, to forests, ruins and dungeons
  • Ultimate weapons to be found
  • Optional boss to find and defeat
  • Mouse Support
  • Quest Journal
